About This Game

Solve exciting criminal cases on the mean streets as member of the autobahn police force - or freely explore the open game world while chasing down high-octane racers. Escort politicians, transport precious goods or take down the criminal element with over 500HP and close to 200MPH. With fully destructible cars, arcade gameplay, outstanding graphics and stunning slow-mo effects, Crash Time 2 puts you right in the driver seat, ready to burn rubber.

  • 5 huge criminal cases to solve with up to 10 missions each
  • Solve cases or freely pursue crimes in the game world
  • Many bonus assignments and more than 40 new tracks
  • Over 20 AI cars with visual damage system
  • Spectacular pileups with impressive and realistic graphics
  • 3 different difficulty settings
  • Additional tasks and mini games are hidden to be discovered
READ MORE

System Requirements

    • OS: Windows XP/Vista
    • Processor: 3.2 GHz Processor
    • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
    • Graphics: DirectX compatible 256 MB graphics card
    • DirectX®: 9.0c
    • Hard Drive: 4.2 GB of available hard disk space
    • Sound: DirectX compatible audio card
READ MORE

2009 © Meridian4. All rights reserved. Crash Time 2 is a trademark of RTL Interactive Game Publishing. All rights reserved. All other trademarks and copyrights are the properties of their respective owners.

DeathEagle
386 products in account
42 reviews
Recommended
0.6 hrs on record
Posted: June 30
Only having played 30 minutes in the game I'd like to say , well done. Well , you're a cop and try to take down assailants with your car in a high speed chase around the city.

I dont remember how i got this game , but in no effect does it justify its store price. Only buy this if you're drunk or its free.

The handling is actually better than need for speed rivals . Handbraking feels solid and destroying traffic lights and civilian cars opts in a title as collateral damage and adds up in euros.

The game has 2 main protagonists. What's his name and his friend. They are cops and you , propably , are the one driving. Now, i did a mission where you had to stay for 5 seconds next to a truck and your passenger cop friend "jumps" on board it in order to take the wheel.

After doing so , my cop car still had him as a passenger throughout the completion of the task. Now , when i noticed it , after a while ... i sighed. Not in dissapointment , but as in a weird feeling you have saying " How did the developers miss that?"

You maybe are saying, this is a cheap ♥♥♥ old game. Sure, but it has actually VOICE ACTING. Yes , it does. And, you guessed right ! It is terrible.

Anyway, like I said.

Purchase when drunk.

86.0 hrs on record
Posted: August 21
Awesome game! I love it i recommend it to the world! Super addicting and fun. But for me, it is LITERALLY the most rage-endusing game ive ever played. idk if its just me, but that game can be just unfair sometimes. like if you flip your car in a 6 minute chase, and you hit "R" to reset your car, the damn thing spawns in a mile behind the enemy, facing the wrong direction! like no! who does that! and then your enemy escapes. its just straight savage! like dude come on. but dont listen to my whining. buy it. the game is so worth it :)

Posted: July 19
It's a fun car game with great physics, whats more to say?

More to say
The voice acting is laughably bad, and the multiplayer is of infinite replay value. Don't buy it for the story, buy it for the free roam gameplay.
